data.name: pharmamind-molminer
data.description: PharmaMindÂ® is an innovative drug discovery platform that integrates advanced artificial intelligence and computational simulation design techniques, which is suitable for real-world novel drug R&D.

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "Molecular structures are commonly depicted in 2D printed forms in scientific documents such as journal papers and patents. However, these 2D depictions are not machine-readable. Due to a backlog of de"
"Here, we present a practical software called MolMiner, which is primarily built using deep neural networks... to recognize atom and bond elements from documents."
"As MolMiner performed similarly well in real-world OCSR tasks with a user-friendly interface, it is an useful and valuable tool for daily applications."
